author: Elijah Kang

changelog.release_notes: -Fixed save settings not working on certain phones
-Fixed Heart Rate display in config page

-Added Hourly Vibration
-Fixed date format ##/##/####
-Fixed negative degrees
-Fixed tick handler stacking
-Fixed other minor bugs

- Added Pebble 2 support
- Fixed Date Format bug on Pebble Classic for [Day Month# Year]
- Updated KiezelPay library to fix regenerate code bug

+ Enabled the calligraphy font but only lowercase letters are available due to memory constraints.
- Fixed Time Color Bug

- Fixed the Distance bug on Pebble Time Round. It's now usable.
- Fixed Time Color bug if None(Larger Time) was selected for the Bottom Text
- Fixed Seconds overflow if None(Larger Time) was selected for the Bottom Text
- Changed the date size on Pebble Time Round to better fit on the visible screen.
- Changed the font scale algorithm for the bottom text. This should be most noticeable on the Pebble Time Round, where it utilizes the full diameter now.
- Changed the BT Disconnect Vibration to a long pulse.
- Changed the Weather Update Interval to adjust by 5 instead of 15.

+ Added partial Italian support
+ Added New Date Formats: Month# Day Year & Day Month# Year. (ie. 06.12.2016)
- Fixed Location cut off for longer names
- Fixed minor French errors

+ Added partial translations for: Spanish, German, Dutch, and French
+ Added Show Seconds
+ Added Larger Steps
- Fixed Time Color Bug
- Fixed Progress Bar Bug on Pebble Time Round
-Fix Pebble Time Round crash bug on distance

+ Fixed OpenWeatherMap calls
+ Added Disable Health option
+ Added selectable health info
+ Added Daily Step Goal
+ Added Weather Update Interval

+ Added Pebble Classic (Aplite) support
+ Added bottom text font option
+ Added bottom text None (Larger Time) option

description:
$0.99 / 24 hour trial
#1 top selling watchface on KiezelPay
#1 most sold in a day
#1 most sold in a month
See why Pebblers are loving Aspire; try the free trial today!

==Overview==
Having trouble looking at difficult-to-read fonts? Want an easy way to view all of your information? Aspire was designed to provide you a clean and simple experience. Easily distinguish between information using the line dividers; while the minimal padding allows you to focus at ease. Keep it Clean, Crisp, & Classy!

==Features==
-Simple, clean design
-Anti-aliasing text
-12 / 24 hour time
-Show seconds option
-US / EU date format
-Imperial / Metric units
-Weather powered by OpenWeatherMap or Weather Underground
-Temperature & Condition
-BT Disconnect Vibration &  BT Icon
-Battery level
-Bottom text can either be the Day of the Week, Location or removed for Larger Time
-Selectable bottom font: Calligraphy or Sans Serif
-Daily Steps & Step Goal Average shown under the progress bar
-Quick View Support
-Master Key Support (pmkey.xyz)

-Languages: English, Español, Deutsch, Nederlands, Français, Italiano

==Purchase==
You have a 24 hour trial to check out all the features Aspire has to offer. Your one time purchase extends to all Pebble models using the same Pebble account. Payments are handled by KiezelPay.

Remember to leave a ❤ if you enjoy using Aspire!

latest_release.release_notes: -Fixed save settings not working on certain phones

title: Aspire
